message: Rule A violation: business_park zone_type must have rating_mode = not_scored
Rule B violation: business_park marked as residential_scored (should usually be not_scored unless it's explicitly mixed-use residential)
Rule C violation: Generic template short_note: "Residential area."
Rule C violation: Generic drivers array ["residential"] - must have specific drivers
